name: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Technician Premium and Prosperity Legacy Pack
name_original: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Technician Premium and Prosperity Legacy Pack
description:
TechWars Global Conflict is the world’s first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

This Bundle will allow you to quickly master the management of new Mechs and get exclusive bonuses. and gives you 1-Day Premium for fastest progression in the game.

This Bundle includes:

- 1-Day Premium activation - 1000 platinum - Gladiator Prosperity Legacy Premium skin - Techwars Global Conflict - The Game
